entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning then changing to snow mixed with rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing this morning and dissipating late this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
